headline: Shapiro skates to Democratic governors nod in Pennsylvania
author: Tal Axelrod
sentences: Shapiro has also benefited from a messy GOP primary, with Republican campaigns and officials waging last-minute talks to coalesce around an alternative to front-runner Doug Mastriano, a state senator whose campaign is mostly centered around unfounded claims of widespread voter fraud in 2020.

Republicans control both chambers of the state legislature in Harrisburg, and flipping the governors mansion would provide them with unified control, a dynamic Shapiro has hyped up amid concerns that a Republican governor could drastically roll back access to abortion.
Democrats coalesced around Shapiro early in the primary process, and hes since been able to build up his campaign bank account to prepare for a contentious general election.
Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro was projected to skate to victory in the states Democratic gubernatorial primary after running virtually unopposed.
The Hill has removed its comment section, as there are many other forums for readers to participate in the conversation.
The gubernatorial race has become even more important given the mushrooming debate over abortion.
Those talks ultimately proved fruitless, as no major candidate withdrew from the race.
We invite you to join the discussion on Facebook and Twitter.
Shapiro is running to replace his boss, term-limited Gov.
The Associated Press called the race at 8:17 p.m.
